argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | prdsbasmpt.y | |- Y = ( S Xs_ R ) |
| 2 |  | prdsbasmpt.b | |- B = ( Base ` Y ) |
| 3 |  | prdsbasmpt.s | |- ( ph -> S e. V ) |
| 4 |  | prdsbasmpt.i | |- ( ph -> I e. W ) |
| 5 |  | prdsbasmpt.r | |- ( ph -> R Fn I ) |
| 6 |  | #P_fnex | |- ( ( R Fn I /\ I e. W ) -> R e. _V ) |
| 7 | 5, 4, 6 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> R e. _V ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fndm | |- ( R Fn I -> dom R = I ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> dom R = I ) |
| 10 | 1, 3, 7, 2, 9 | #P_prdsbas | |- ( ph -> B = X_ x e. I ( Base ` ( R ` x ) ) ) |
